alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 10:47PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kimble, southeastern Menard and Mason Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near London, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junction, Mason, Art, Loyal Valley, Saline, Streeter, Camp Air, Hilda, Grit, Katemcy, Telegraph, Pontotoc, Fredonia, Segovia, Hedwigs Hill, Long Mountain, London, South Llano River State Park, Hext and Erna. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 449 and 477. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
